title: The Girls In The Band (2014)  documentary
description:
The Girls In The Band (2014) A documentary film by Judy Chaikin
runtime 88 minutes

Imdb  tt1677642

Summary notes

"The girls in the band (88 min.) tells the poignant, untold stories of female jazz and big band instrumentalists and their fascinating, groundbreaking journeys from the late 1930s to the present day."  from the container

My notes


  There is a lot more to this film than that brief note.  The research credits run about seven minutes. Many of the  archive images and stills have been seen by few previously.

As always I encourage libraries and also schools to get the original package.
It contains discussion notes for teachers and comes in two lengths on the original disk: this full version and one geared to an hour long school classroom presentation.

You can find more at the film's site using your search tools.

--

For a year or more I have torrented the film International Sweethearts of Rhythm

my other torrents can be seen here:
 <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/user/loninappleton" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/user/loninappleton</a>

Some of the interviewees such as Roz Kron and others from the Sweethearts appear on this film as well.  But there is a lot more.  It had me getting emotional that such a film got made showing the larger role of women in jazz as players and also leaders and arrangers.  

Enjoy the film.  But don't let it end at your desktop.  It is a teaching tool and is of great benefit to youngsters who want to pursue music.

Notes written March 28th, 2015
